pilithura: me rate sampath wikinimata erehiwa, rajya sewawa arbudayakata lak kirima wagema watup wisamatha thuran nokirimata erehiwa, krushikarmanthaya gaththoth me rate gowiyata dipu porondu kada karala gowithana winasha kirimata erehiwa, samruddhi prathilabha kappaduwata erehiwa, badu mila ihala yamata erehiwa, wyapara binda wattawimata erehiwa, pathalaya hisa osawana hama thanama mini marum.

pare gamanagamanaye yedena janathawage mulu bara lanka gamanagamana mandalayata (langama) pawarunu athara, awanka rajakariyak kirimata saha yahapath mahajana sewawak sapayimata ee magin mona tharam prayathnayak ganunath, sigrayen wardhanaya wemin pawathi janagahanayath samaga ee karyaya nisiyakarayen kara ganimata langamata nupuluwan wiya. 1977 di balayata path aluth aanduwa, nawathath bas sewawa pudgalikaranaya keleya.

eya gramiya yatithala pahasum labadime sita me rata aasiyawe purna sanwardhitha deshayak bawata path kirima dakwa kriyathmaka kirimata yojitha wadapiliwelak.jathika aagamika, adhyapanika, sanskruthika, anshayangen manasika sanwardhanayath krushikarmaya, karmantha, deshiya wideshiya wanija kriyawaliya, sthawara aarakshaka upakrama, paudgalika anshayatada sahaya demin rajya anshaya widhimathwa shakthimath kirima saha deshaye abhimanaya kirthiya raka ganima wani pulul salasmak ehi anthargathayi.me siyallama kala haki dewal misa manan kalpitha wu rawatili yojana waliyak noweyi.jana jiwithaya naga situwamin aasiyawe aashcharyaya bawata shri lankawa path kirime salasmak ehi anthargathayi.palath sabha manthri nithignya shalitha wijesundara, biyagama shrilanipa sanwidhayaka apekshaka dulip wijesekara, palath sabha manthri gunasiri jayanath mahathwaruda sabhawa amathuha.
